name: AddVerifiedDomain
description:
Add a verified domain to your Mailchimp account.

Use this tool to add a verified domain to your Mailchimp account. This is useful for managing communication and ensuring trust with your recipients.

parameters.name: verification_email_address
parameters.description: The email address at the domain to verify, which will receive a two-factor challenge for verification.

value_schema.description: The e-mail address at the domain you want to verify. This will receive a two-factor challenge to be used in the verify action.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: verification_email
parameters.description: The e-mail address at the domain you want to verify. This will receive a two-factor challenge to be used in the verify action.

value_schema.description: The e-mail address at the domain you want to verify. This will receive a two-factor challenge to be used in the verify action.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
